name: SetBrush

arguments.name: size
arguments.desc: Size of brush in voxels (must be in range 1 to 16)

arguments.name: index
arguments.desc: Material index or path to brush vox file

arguments.name: object
arguments.desc: Optional object in brush vox file if brush vox file is used

description: Set material index to be used for following calls to DrawShapeLine and DrawShapeBox and ExtrudeShape.
An optional brush vox file and subobject can be used and provided instead of material index,
in which case the content of the brush will be used and repeated. Use material index zero
